Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2006 01:36AM Jeep wrote: I had a mast for a small tumor. 11mm. But they found two other very small invasive tumors. I don't recall now, but like 1 mm and 2 mm. The smallest two didn't show up on mammogram or Ultra Sound. And were not in same area as tumor found by mammo. Glad I had the mast! Most doc's don't recommend a mast unless it's really medically necessary.
Posts.Title: should choose today if mastectomy or radiation linapril gwenn
